isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ENGINE CRANK INHIBIT SYSTEM (ECI) - ECM TERMINAL 35 (ECI)

svcproc.title: ECM TERMINAL 35 (ECI)
svcproc.para: ECM terminal 35 is connected by circuit 97H to Crank Inhibit Relay terminal 5. Based on inputs to ECM terminal 10 and engine operating conditions, the ECM either applies 0.1 - 0.6 volts or 12 volts to terminal 35. If the ECM applies 0.1 - 0.6 volts to terminal 35, the Crank Inhibit Relay is "enabled." If the ECM applies 12 volts to terminal #35, then the Crank Inhibit Relay is NOT "enabled."
